verses.verse: Sing<WH7442> for joy<WH7442> in the Lord,<WH3068> O you righteous<WH6662> ones;<WH6662> Praise<WH8416> is becoming<WH5000> to the upright.<WH3477>
Give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to the Lord<WH3068> with the lyre;<WH3658> Sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to Him with a harp<WH5035> of ten<WH6218> strings.<WH6218>
Sing<WH7891> to Him a new<WH2319> song;<WH7892> Play<WH5059> skillfully<WH3190> with a shout<WH8643> of joy.<WH8643>
For the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> is upright;<WH3477> And all<WH3605> His work<WH4639> is [done] in faithfulness.<WH530>
He loves<WH157> righteousness<WH6666> and justice;<WH4941> The earth<WH776> is full<WH4390> of the lovingkindness<WH2617> of the Lord.<WH3068>
By the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> the heavens<WH8064> were made,<WH6213> And by the breath<WH7307> of His mouth<WH6310> all<WH3605> their host.<WH6635>
He gathers<WH3664> the waters<WH4325> of the sea<WH3220> together as a heap;<WH5067> He lays<WH5414> up the deeps<WH8415> in storehouses.<WH214>
Let all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> fear<WH3372> the Lord;<WH3068> Let all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the world<WH8398> stand<WH9076> in awe<WH9076> of Him.
For He spoke,<WH559> and it was done;<WH1961> He commanded,<WH6680> and it stood<WH5975> fast.
The Lord<WH3068> nullifies<WH6565> the counsel<WH6098> of the nations;<WH1471> He frustrates<WH5106> the plans<WH4284> of the peoples.<WH5971>
The counsel<WH6098> of the Lord<WH3068> stands<WH5975> forever,<WH5769> The plans<WH4284> of His heart<WH3820> from generation<WH1755> to generation.<WH1755>
Blessed<WH835> is the nation<WH1471> whose<WH834> God<WH430> is the Lord,<WH3068> The people<WH5971> whom He has chosen<WH977> for His own inheritance.<WH5159>
The Lord<WH3068> looks<WH5027> from heaven;<WH8064> He sees<WH7200> all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of men;<WH120>
From His dwelling<WH3427> place<WH4349> He looks<WH7688> out On all<WH3605> the inhabitants<WH3427> of the earth,<WH776>
He who fashions<WH3335> the hearts<WH3820> of them all,<WH3162> He who understands<WH995> all<WH3605> their works.<WH4639>
The king<WH4428> is not saved<WH3467> by a mighty<WH7230> army;<WH2428> A warrior<WH1368> is not delivered<WH5337> by great<WH7230> strength.<WH3581>
A horse<WH5483> is a false<WH8267> hope<WH8267> for victory;<WH8668> Nor<WH3808> does it deliver<WH4422> anyone by its great<WH7230> strength.<WH2428>
Behold,<WH2009> the eye<WH5869> of the Lord<WH3068> is on those who fear<WH3372> Him, On those who hope<WH3176> for His lovingkindness,<WH2617>
To deliver<WH5337> their soul<WH5315> from death,<WH4194> And to keep<WH2421> them alive<WH2421> in famine.<WH7458>
Our soul<WH5315> waits<WH2442> for the Lord;<WH3068> He is our help<WH5828> and our shield.<WH4043>
For our heart<WH3820> rejoices<WH8055> in Him, Because<WH3588> we trust<WH982> in His holy<WH6944> name.<WH8034>
Let Thy lovingkindness,<WH2617> O Lord,<WH3068> be upon us, According as we have hoped<WH3176> in Thee.
